sub_title: country coordinator  at PUM Country coordinator of Ecuador & Panamá
summary:
In depth actual knowledge of several developing economies        ( Morocco, Ecuador & Panamá) 

Substantial knowledge of complex international negotiations
for buying and selling businesses , investments and divestments, reorganisations up to 30% of organisations well in excess of 1000 persons

Finance deals , responsible for complex IT projects ( SAP mainframe and server based) , distribution.

Safety , health and environment

Specialties: Finance, accounting , general management , organisation of complex company changes
